title: Banjo-Tooie Returns, What’s Left for Switch Online? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.18.24
description:
New World: Aeternum is OUT NOW on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S! https://bit.ly/3XROcCT 

We’re here to talk about video game news!

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
 - GAMESCAST answers Andy’s question of When is it OK for Capitalism to Ruin Games?
 - The STREAM is MORE Alien Isolation!
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
 - Due to an editing bottleneck, you can get THREE brand new Gregways today!

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:58 - Housekeeping
                     -  The Roper Report   -
00:07:18 - Banjo-Tooie comes to Nintendo Switch Online
00:29:19 - Tales of Kenzera: Zau Studio Puts Developers on Redundancy Notice, Seeks Funding, Surgent Twitter…
00:36:43 - Let’s Do a Review Round-Up DOUBLE FEATURE!
00:46:21 - Call of Duty 2025 Reportedly a Black Ops 2 Sequel Set 'Around 2030'
00:48:23 - Biggest News of the Day: You Can Bend Your Knees in Sea of Thieves
00:49:33 - Wee News!
00:51:13 - You‘re Wrong

In Review – Movies Ranked, Reviewed, & Recapped: https://bit.ly/2VAgdT7
PS I Love You XOXO – A PlayStation Podcast: https://bit.ly/3r3rjvB
Kinda Funny Xcast – An Xbox Podcast: https://bit.ly/36twqvD
